fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Tradesman: For every trade you complete, you may upgrade a single card in your Hand. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Satchel: Apply (Satcheled) to a card in your Hand. [3 uses, 1 CD] 
- Reforge: Apply (Reforged) to a card in your Hand. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Upgrade: Apply (Upgraded) to a card in your Hand. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
